Saada Mkuya Salum (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị CCM nke Tanzania na onye a họpụtara dịka onye omeiwu
Ọ bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka ego.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lumumba Secondary School, wee nweta diplọma ya na Business Studies na Stamford College na Malaysia. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The Open University nke ndi  mba Tanzania na afọ 2009 na nzere masta na Business ma nweta MBA ya na Mahadum Heriot-Watt
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2014, ọ na-agbaso PhD ya na nchịkwa azụmahịa site na The Open University of Tanzania
Onye isi ala Kikwete họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu na ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2012 ma mesịa họpụta ya dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ego
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2014, Salum nọchiri William Mgimwa dị ka Minista nke iri na anọ nke ego.
